Description:
Amazing Family Home
Situated in a quite cal de sac this appealing family home is in an ideal location with playground and public transport just around the corner.
Offering 4 good size bedrooms master with walk in robe and ensuite, all other bedrooms have built in robes, central family bathroom, formal lounge room and open plan kitchen/dining/living room.
With the comforts of ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double remote garage and landscaped gardens this family home exudes warmth & comfort inside and out.
Insights: 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Elevated Corner Block with Dual Access
Located in the centre of old Clifton Springs and providing the possibility of extensive views this elevated corner block is one not to be missed. Centrally located between Drysdale and Curlewis retail precincts it would be ideal for a quick trip to the shops at any time. Local schools, kindergartens and recreational areas are in close proximity to this location. Simply back out the boat and drive down to the boat ramp which is 5 minutes away. Approx 583m2.

Description:
GREAT BUY FOR FAMILY, WELL DESIGNED WITH LOADS OF SPACE AND AFFORDABLE.
No. 4 is a Dennis home which will delight the astute buyer. Immediately appealing light filled entrance, the formal lounge room is adjacent and allows for that quiet second living. The second area includes dining, living and gourmet kitchen, all opening to the undercover entertaining space allowing easy flow between in and outside. Four bedrooms or three and a study, BIRs. The extra-large master bedroom has ensuite and can easily be classed as a retreat area allowing for flexible use. Central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features include central heating, evaporative cooling, pantry, s/s upright stove, solar hot water, dishwasher, stone benches, glass splashbacks, quality window furnishings and more. Double garage with internal access, side access to rear yard.

Description:
Tranquil Setting for the Avid Golfer
This 604m2 block is situated in a quiet crescent surrounded by established homes and gardens with the local golf course at the rear. Vacant land with access to the Clifton Springs Golf Course does not come along every day. The block is level and large enough to allow for a substantial home with extra shedding. Your modern new build could encompass bay views from a second level. Sit back and enjoy the serenity of the area.
Located within walking distance to the beach front and public transport. Close to all local amenities, cafes and the Clifton Springs Boat Ramp.

Description:
Sweeping Bay Views
Gun barrel views of the You Yangs in an established area amongst quality houses. A massive block of 664 sqm offering sweeping panoramic views of Corio Bay; from Geelong to the Melbourne skyline.
18.2 metre frontage. 36.5 metres deep.
Views are to the rear of the property & northerly facing.
Design your home with living & deck to make the most of this exceptional location.
This may be the last opportunity in this established estate to be on a large parcel of land.

Description:
Build or Invest
Situated centrally to all amenities that Drysdale and Clifton Springs has to offer. This block has great potential for your new family or retirement residence. For those with a young family the local kindergarten and primary school are a short stroll away with the local playground and parks nearby. If contemplating retirement the land is ample for a house with shedding at the rear. Surrounded by established properties, fenced on 2 sides and ready to purchase now. Approx. 586m2.

Description:
Large, sandstone family home
Ample living areas, terra cotta tiles and the spacious backyard. With formal lounge, four bedrooms, laundry and plenty of storage space, you will love the dining, living and lounge. The master bedroom comes with generous walk in closet and ensuite, two single bedrooms have built in robes. The fourth room can be utilized as study. The open kitchen is bright and spacious overlooking the massive family area. Multiple accesses to the Al fresco. Double garage with roller door to the back of the property. Evap cooling and central heating throughout the property. The main backyard can accommodate a big shed or can be subdivided (S.T.C.A). Located in a quite suburb, close to shops and schools, this sandstone beauty is ready to be moved into.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT- HAYESWINCKLE DRYSDALE
***PHOTO ID REQUESTED UPON INSPECTION***
Clifton Springs is certainly a hot spot and a huge growth corridor for the Bellarine. Located perfectly, just 300m to the bay and 100m to the shops with a number of schools, including high/primary schools and daycare facilities in close proximity. This home represents value as an investment, currently rented for $320 per week, or an AFFORDABLE first home option with the locale adding bonus value.
Comprising 5 bedrooms, 4 with built-in robes and the 5th smaller bedroom (with no robes), currently set up as a single bedroom but would also make an ideal nursery, playroom or study. The main bathroom is equipped with bath, shower and separate toilet. A spacious lounge room on polished boards, dining room, kitchen with gas cooktop and laundry complete this tidy brick home. Set upon approx. 622m2 gives this property a large back yard with plenty of room to move including a decked area shaded with a large sail.
Features of this home include, a single-lock-up garage + lots of extra parking space along the driveway, polished floor boards, ceiling fans, central heating in addition to 2x split system units.
A great entry level property or a savvy investment for any buyer looking on the Bellarine!
Insights: 4 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Blue Chip Real Estate with Golf Course Access.
This north facing, golf course access property, has been designed so all living spaces take in the enviable views over Clifton Springs Golf Course and the You Yangs with Corio Bay in the foreground. The open plan kitchen meals and family room area has a gas log fire and renovated kitchen flowing onto the alfresco entertaining; whilst the formal lounge enjoys brilliant views over the first fairway and the expansive rear yard of this 1200 square meter block of land. 3 large bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, double carport & double garage are added features to be enjoyed in this renovated highly sought after and tightly held blue chip piece of Bellarine Peninsula Real Estate.

Description:
A Home With It All- And Then Some!
This immaculately presented 4 bedroom family home has ample space inside and out for the growing family. Set on a generous 801m2 allotment and offering 4 bedrooms (ensuite to master) plus study and 2 generously proportioned living zones. The kitchen is well equipped, has ample cupboard space, walk in pantry, meals area and adjoining family room. The formal lounge room is large enough to accommodate the largest family gathering. Your comfort is assured all year round with gas central heating and evaporative cooling. Outdoor living is a breeze with a huge enclosed and under cover entertainment area complete with spa. The double garage has remote control and internal access for your convenience plus drive-through access. This property is presented to perfection so you can move in and sit back and enjoy the relaxing lifestyle it offers. Located among other quality homes this property is a must to inspect. You cannot help but be impressed!

Description:
Walk to the Beach
This established 3 bedroom brick home offers the lucky purchaser a great opportunity to walk along the beach on sunny afternoon. Large formal lounge with built-in bar, formal dining area plus a rumpus room with access to the rear decking. Spacious kitchen with new electric oven and classic benchtops and tiles. Full ensuite and walk-in robe. Reverse-cycle split-system air conditioner. Outside is a sunny north-facing rear deck, double garage with drive-through rear access, plus circular driveway. Plenty of room for the extra vehicles. This very solid construction provides a potential upstairs extension with excellent provide bay views.

Description:
Views to the Bay!
Designed to capture views of Corio Bay, this split-level home is a renovator's delight just waiting to be shown some love. Situated in an elevated position, taking in amazing views from your wrap-around balcony, this home offers a holiday lifestyle. The ground floor conveniently features three bedrooms, all with built-in-robes and master with full ensuite, separate toilet and laundry. An open plan kitchen with meals area and living area are bathed in light and offer amazing water views. Additional benefits include exposed beams, floating floorboards and main bathroom with corner spa bath. Ducted heating and cooling let you set the home to the desired temperature. Outside, a paved patio and BBQ area are the focal points of the rear yard, while a double lock-up garage with remote control completes this property. Located within and easy walk to schools, shops, public transport and the waters edge, don't miss out on this brilliant opportunity.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
LARGE HOUSE, LARGE BLOCK, GREAT SPOT
We are often looking for room to move around in a home. All the rooms of this home are of generous proportions with a very functional floorplan.
Comprising of two living areas, 4 bedrooms all with walk in robes, ensuite with spa bath to main bedroom. Undercover outdoor area directly off the family for the times you choose to entertain.
Why would Clifton Springs be your suburb of choice? Well it provides all your daily requirements such as shopping, medical, schools, public transport. It also provides all your leisure activities, walking, biking, riding tracks, fishing, golf, restaurants and cafes. Keep the kids and yourself busy with footy, cricket, tennis, dance etc.
Having lived here for nearly thirty years I can vouch for the availability of all you need to work, rest and play.
Not familiar with the area? Come for a drive and check it out you will be more that impressed.

Description:
Two Titles, And A Large Designer Home
Perfectly situated in a prestigious locale, this magnificent custom-built home (2009 HIA Awards finalist) is a modern masterpiece of space and style. The 4-bed, 4-living room floorplan will appeal to families, whilst the privilege of space and great shedding is ideal for a tradesman. Set on a fully landscaped double block, boasting bay views and close proximity to Drysdale village, this one is truly unique!
-2-storey floorplan zoned perfectly for entertaining and private family time
-Downstairs: office, cinema, lounge, alfresco, kitchen/living hub, laundry and powder room
-Upstairs: master suite, living zone, 3 further queen-sized BRs, bathroom and toilet
-Porcelain, Southern Box and quality carpet flooring throughout
-Tall ceilings, superb fixtures and custom window furnishings
-Ducted Inverter heating and cooling ensures total comfort
-Office ideally placed at the facade for a home run business
-Cinema with raised seating platform, projector and surround sound
-Private lounge with built-in bar and direct access to protected Alfresco entertaining
-Fabulously spacious kitchen/dining/living hub at the rear with cosy gas log fire
-Chefs kitchen with butler’s pantry and superior European appliances
-Smeg 900mm gas/electric cooker, Asko dishwasher, glass rangehood and splashback
-Indoor-outdoor atmosphere with access to the Alfresco deck and backyard
-Fully equipped laundry with laundry chute and storeroom
-The powder room is convenient to the living zones
-Understair storeroom
-The inviting upper storey boasts a muted and rejuvenating ambiance
-5-star master suite with bay-view balcony, His and Hers WIRs and luxurious ensuite
-Ensuite with bay-view spa bath, twin vanities, double shower and separate toilet
-Generous upper living zone with built-in storage
-2 minor BR’s with built-in desks and shelving
-Classy family bathroom with bath, shower, laundry chute and separate toilet
-Ducted vacuum downstairs
-Double remote garage with internal access
-The 2nd block is separately titled - an awesome investment for the future!
-2nd lock includes double gated kerb access and a lawn framed by landscaped gardens
-Huge shed/workshop (9x16m approx) plus a high-clearance carport sits at the rear
-The ultimate ‘mancave’ with wood-burning heater and plenty of space for tinkering
-14,500L rainwater tank with pump and automated sprinkler system
-Set within a short walk of all family amenities, shopping and a choice of schools
-In the heart of The Bellarine, well-known for wineries, beaches and organic produce
This urban lifestyle property is sure to impress! Arrange an inspection today!
